question:
The line graph below shows the percentage of tourists to England who visited four different attractions in Brighton.

Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.

Write at least 150 words.

IELTS Writing Sample
text: The bar chart illustrates the portion of men, women and children who consumed fruits and vegetables over an 8 year-period from 2001 to 2008 in the UK.
Overall, the consumption of fruits and vegetables was highest by the women, followed by men who were moderate and the least proportion accounts for children.

The percentage of women who ate fruits and vegetables was about 22% in 2001. This percent increased rapidly and by 2006 it has reached to almost 35%, and then dropped to 30% in 2008. Then the percent of men and children who ingested fruits and vegetables was stable from 2001 to 2003 with almost 17% and 12% each. Then the rate has elevated slowly since 2004 and in 2006 it was noted as approximately 23% and 28% respectively. However, in 2007 the male who had intake fruits and vegetables were consistent, but the percentage of kids who ate these has shot up to 25%. Finally, in 2008 the proportion of male and children consuming the food dropped to about 26% and 24% each.
